body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear,4K+1080P WiFi Dual Dash Camera for Cars with App, 3" IPS Dual Dashboard Camera Recorder,Night Vision,24H/7 Parking Mode, Loop Recording,170° Wide Angle,Free 64GB SD Card

features: 【Real 4K+1080P Dual Dash Cam 】---Front cam - ultra 4K( 3840*2160P, 30FPS),Rear/inside- FHD 1080P( 1920*1080P, 30FPS),To reduce the blind areas,the front cam wide angle of 170 degree and rear cam wide angle of 160 degree. clearly capture the key details like road signs,vehicle plates...It provides the significant evidence for car accidents.

【WiFi & Phone APP Control】---The 4K dash cam front and rear support free APP for Android or iOS smartphones. Easily access record videos,watch live stream ,Setting camera,download and share your footages to social midea by smartphone directly. Don't hesitate to share any recorded journey to your friends.

【Optional Inside/Rear Camera】---You can install the small car dashcam on front windsheld to record inside or install on rear windsheld to monitor backside of your car. 2 methods installation for you to choose.

【Crystal Night Version With HDR】---The 4K dash camera is equipped with advanced Sonsor + 170°wide-angle + 6 Glass lens，the front and back dash cam will record crystal video at night. HDR function can cut down on glare and reflection.

【Accident lock & 24/7 Parking monitor】① G-sensor---lock the video as vital evidence when detects a bump happen even on road or during parking time， it won't be overwritten.② Loop recording--- Overwrite the oldest vidoe with the lastest video automatically when TF card is full. ③ 24/7 recording /Time Lapse--- dash cam captures and records footage at 1fps/3fps per second to conserve memory, allowing for continuous surveillance of a parked vehicle.One Reliable witness anytime.
【1 Year WArranty & 24/7 Customer Service】------This wireless dash cam with app comes with full 1-YEAR WARRANTY and 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.our after-sales team 7/24hours online for you.
✅ Please directly search the "Viidure" in the Google Play/App Store if the QR code to download the smartphone app in manual has been suspended.
✅ WiFi Wireless dash cam --- wireless means WiFi app control from your smartphone to download videos. the dash cam need cables to plug in power and rear camera need wire to connect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GMAIPOP G900 4K WiFi Dash cam Front (4K Ultra HD 2160P)and Rear/Inside(1080P FHD ) Dash Cam Front and Rear/Inside--Ultra 2160P( 3840*2160P, 30FPS) +FHD 1080P( 1080P, 30FPS). Accurately capture clear and crystal videos during the day and night , provide the significant evidence for car accidents.Built-in Wi-Fi - The WiFi wireless dashcam easily access videos with App (IOS/Android available),convenient to view, download, and share the footage to social media.Optional inside/rear camera--The small camera can be installed on front windshield to record inside or installed on rear windshield to monitor backside of your car. 2 methods installation for you to choose.

Support Max 256GB Card （64GB Card included） What's in box G900 4K dash cam 1080P Rear camera 19.5ft cable for rear cam,5ft cable for inside 3 pcs Electrostatic film, 5pcs cable clip Suction Mount ,adhesive mount Car Charger, User Manual Car Wiring Trim Tool 64GB U3 card(Has inserted in cam body) Convenient Cellphone App, Compact Size Car wireless dash cam Front and Rear Driving safety, Enjoying Travel Warm Tips Battery & Charging: 200mAh only,please keep plug with power for it to work.WiFi Wireless dash cam : wireless means WiFi app control from your smartphone. the dash cam need cables to plug in power and rear camera need wire to connect.The rear camera is not waterproof . Recommend install rear camera inside of your vehicle (on rear windshield). Interface: Type-C WiFi Free App : VIIDURE Screen: 3" 2.5D IPS Glass screen Operating temperature : -4°F to 165°F Viewing Angle/Aperture: Front 170°, Rear/Inside:160° Maximum Storage/Type: 256GB Class 10, U3 Speed Micro SD Card

Seamless & Endless Loop Recording The 4K car dash cam can overwrite the oldest video with the latest video automatically when TF card is full. G-sensor Auto-lock Emergency The G900 dashcam can auto-lock the video as vital evidence when detects a bump happen even on road or during parking time, it won't be overwritten. 24 Hours Parking Monitor/Time Lapse The wireless dash cam captures and records footage at 1fps/3fps per second to conserve memory, allowing for continuous surveillance of a parked vehicle. TYPE-C Hardwired kit is needed.(Asin B0CC9JXNVD)

Super Night version with HDR The Car security dash camera is equipped with advanced Sensor + 170° wide-angle + 6 Glass Len . It will record crystal videos at night. HDR function can cut down on glare and reflection. Heat Resistant Design(-4°F to 165°F) The 4K dash camera has enough heat dissipation hole on top and bottom of the dash cam body. Even you live in hot Texas or cold Alaska, it can perfectly adapt to the local temperature environment and run well. Included Adhesive and Suction Mounts The GMAIPOP dash camera for cars comes with 2 mounts-- Adhesive & suction Mount . we recommend stick electrostatic film between windshield and mount to avoid fall down solution.

MOST IMPORTANT: 64GB TF card has been inserted in dash camera body, please format sd card when use firstly.Require keep charging: please always keep the dash cam plugged into your car's cigarette lighter to get power. The internal small battery(200Mah) is only used for maintain and save settings.The rear camera is not waterproof . Recommend install rear camera inside of your vehicle.24 HOURS PARKING MODE REQUIREMENT: To achieve 24 hours/7 parking mode function, an extra Type-C hardwired kit is required (Search ASIN: B0CC9JXNVD, not included in the package). This hardwired kit is customized for G900: never purchase it from other vendors, their hardwire kit will not activate the parking mode function of this G900 dash cam. 5. Please remove the lens protective film before use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, great product
reviews.reviewText: Easily installed this product in our vehicle. Great functionality and picture quality. Really like that once installed it turns itself on when you start the car and off when you turn the car off, so its always recording with little effort on the driver's part. Easily paired with your phone via the app, able to pick any recordings to download to your phone and save to your camera roll or text to someone else. Very happy with the product and have ordered a second for our other vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality construction and instructions
reviews.reviewText: I have not had this dash cam very long, but what I have seen of it, it is a quality product. I have installed numerous security and auto cameras recently and find that this one excels in appearance, hardware, and super support response. The instruction manual is clear and very useful. I hope that the unit will prove to be as good in the long term as it appears to be now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera, amazing price!!!
reviews.reviewText: I recommend the camera. Very good image and sound quality easy to install.I highly recommend camera. Jozef Gruz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great deal, seemingly good quality, but could use improvement
reviews.reviewText: As far as dashcams go, this is pretty standard fare. I won't go into highlighting all the goods, as if I don't mention it, you can assume it's fine. I bought this as a gift for family member but I have had experience with multiple types of dashcams myself.For the main power cord, it's USB-C. That's great. The problem is the 12 volt power connector is integrated with the cable which means it's all one piece. A better solution would be a 12 volt power plug with a USB type A connector, and then a USB type A cable to USB type-c cable to deliver power. For some cars that don't have multiple 12 volt power ports or USB ports, this occupies the entire 12 volt port. Fortunately since it's Type-C, I can easily swap out the whole power cable with a 15-watt rated 12 volt power plug, and a 10-ft USB type A to USB type-c cable.The rear camera, as far as I could see, did not have a software function to flip the image. Initially I installed the camera upside down. There was no indicator I saw as to which direction was correct. Fortunately, the adhesive did not set fully and I was able to readjust it. A pro here is the rear facing camera is adjustable easily, and is not the crappy kind in a lot of dash cams.Comes with a trim tool and extra parts which are helpful with installation. Comes with an extended warranty from the manufacturer. So far decent image quality. I was not able to test the Wi-Fi function and have yet to see actual footage, as the vehicle isn't mine. For the price, this is great overall. It's not perfect but completely livable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good
reviews.reviewText: The dash cam works great with no problems so far. Installation was clear and detailed, and the app works as intended to download video clips to your phone. Clips cut and loop every 4 minutes or so and doesn’t take up space on my phone since it’s all in the app, unless you download them. Comes with 64gb storage so you don’t need to buy anything extra, except an external hard drive if you want 24hr monitoring, which I’m fine without. Video quality is decent for the price, the front camera is noticeably better quality than the back. Been having it for 2 months now and works well. Overall gets the job done if you want a system that documents proof of car accidents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install, great quality
reviews.reviewText: I drive a ram 1500 crew cab so I need a camera system that has a compatible rear camera. This set up is fantastic. It was easy to install, cables were plenty long enough to run around the cab tucking them away, and they are both easy to adjust for the perfect view front and rear. The video quality is excellent and I really like the apps features. I can download and save clips directly to my phone over WiFi and I can view both cameras on my phone! I love it and for the price I paid it couldn’t be better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Took snapshot of a friend's plate who was less than 6 feet in front of me at a light. Even after blowing up photo, could not even make out the STATE the plate was from. Back camera does not perform thru tinted windows. I could see white tailgate in daytime, and blinding glare of headlights at night.Returned it. Still looking for decent dash cam.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good picture quality
reviews.reviewText: The camera is easy to set up and run. Picture quality is good enough to read license plates at maybe 25 ft - not quite what I had hoped, but still pretty good, considering it's an ultra-wide-angle lens. The exposure isn't bothered too much by sunshine. Haven't tried it yet at night.My only gripe is that the power adapter goes from a male cigarette lighter plug to a USB-C plug. Most cars (like mine) have only one cigarette lighter jack that runs off of the accessory circuit, and we often like to run more than one device (e.g. cell phone charging). It would be so much more useful to have a USB-A to USB-C cable, so that it could be plugged into a cigarette lighter - to - dual USB port adapter.The rear camera cable is probably long enough to go from the windshield, around the ceiling molding, to the rear of a full-sized SUV (I think). I recommend powering the device by installing a 12V to USB-A adapter in the interior fuse block area, using a piggyback fuse holder. Then run an extension USB cable behind the trim to the upper windshield. Make the final connection with a very short USB-A to USB-C cable. They're available on Amazon as short as 6". Using this method, you won't use up valuable cigarette lighter connections.
